name: UNHERD
description:
The game follows a chinchilla, who awakens in a surreal world with a mysterious voice that looms over him. You have 9 hours to defeat Darkness that threatens the earth.

The title’s gameplay and mechanics constitute a departure from the old 3D platformer games, featuring a puzzle-like feeling to it, a detailed character movement and interesting visuals.

Featuring:

  • Classic Joystick Game Play.
  • 21 Levels with individual Challenges.
  • Ranking with Steam Leaderboards.
  • Inclusion of Real-Time.
  • Punishing Mechanics.



Are you up for the challenge?
